00013 /// \ingroup driver_hw
00014 /// \defgroup i2ceeprom Interface for standard I2C EEPROM memories (i2ceeprom.c)
00015 /// \code #include "i2ceeprom.h" \endcode
00016 /// \par Overview
00017 ///     This library provides functions for reading and writing standard
00018 /// 24Cxxx/24LCxxx I2C EEPROM memories.  Memory sizes up to 64Kbytes are
00019 /// supported.  Future revisions may include page-write support.
00020 //

00022 //      which can be found at http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt
00023 //

00026 #ifndef I2CEEPROM_H
00027 #define I2CEEPROM_H
00028 
00029 #include "global.h"
00030 
00031 // functions
00032 
00033 //! Initialize I2C EEPROM interface
00034 void i2ceepromInit(void);
00035 
00036 //! In the I2C EEPROM at [i2cAddr], read a byte from memory location [memAddr]
00037 u08 i2ceepromReadByte(u08 i2cAddr, u32 memAddr);
00038 
00039 //! In the I2C EEPROM at [i2cAddr], write a byte [data] to the memory location [memAddr]
00040 void i2ceepromWriteByte(u08 i2cAddr, u32 memAddr, u08 data);
00041 
00042 #endif
